name: Ecumenical Hunger Program
description: The Ecumenical Hunger Program serves East Palo Alto and surrounding communities with nutritionally balanced food boxes, helping families stretch their food budgets.
fullDescription: The Ecumenical Hunger Program serves East Palo Alto and surrounding communities with nutritionally balanced food boxes, helping families stretch their food budgets.
whatTheyOffer:
- Nutritionally balanced food boxes
- Fresh produce when available
- Available for families and individuals
- Appointment required
- Serving East Palo Alto and neighboring communities
- Additional services including clothing and furniture
howToGetIt: Call to schedule an appointment. First-time clients should bring proof of address. Food distribution is available on scheduled days.
address: 2411 Pulgas Avenue, East Palo Alto, CA 94303
keywords: Ecumenical Hunger Program, East Palo Alto, food boxes, free food, produce, clothing, furniture, San Mateo County
